Heavy.name: Breastplate
Heavy.details: A sturdy metal plate to protect your chest.

Heavy.name: Body Guard
Heavy.details: Reduces all damage that exceeds your current HP by 25%. A mystical wood+metal armor that deflects blows from vital areas.
specialEffects: Reduces damage exceeding current HP by 25%

Heavy.name: Half-Plate
Heavy.details: +5% Pierce and Slash Resistance A partial suit of armor that offers great protection.

Heavy.name: Mist Armor
Heavy.details: On Battle Start: Gain Mist Armor LV4. A heavy and mysterious armor that gradually vanishes.
specialEffects: Mist Armor LV4 on battle start

Heavy.name: Akmedis
Heavy.details: +25 HP, +25 FP Reduces Critical Damage modifier for low power weapons.
specialEffects: Critical damage reduction vs low power weapons

Heavy.name: Brightray Plate
Heavy.details: +5 Power to Mercalan Spells 10% Darkness Resistance A golden glowing suit of armor.

Heavy.name: Knight's Armor
Heavy.details: If your main class is a Soldier class, the stat bonuses it gives you are increased by 50% (min. 1 if >0).

Heavy.name: Alchemic Plate
Heavy.details: Doubles item material effects that modify this item's parameters.

Heavy.name: Braveheart
Heavy.details: Immunity to Hesitation. The shine of this armor inspires its wearer to do great things.

Heavy.name: Cruel Commander
Heavy.details: Grants Skill: Contract of Blood. Sometimes, the best strategy isn't the most compassionate.

Heavy.name: Dragon King's Armor
Heavy.details: Set: Dragon King Increases total Strength by 5% and soft cap for Strength by 3 for each Dragon King item equipped.
specialEffects: +3 STR soft cap per set piece

Heavy.name: Terrasque Shell
Heavy.details: +50 HP Recover 3 HP Each Round. Fragment of shell from a legendary beast.

Heavy.name: Wyvern Rider's Plate
Heavy.details: -10% damage from Bow weapons. +10 Critical Evade VS Bow weapons.

Heavy.name: Starless Night
Heavy.details: +3 Darkness ATK Protection From Spatial race. Darkheart enchant blocks Star Map skills.

Heavy.name: Bellplate
Heavy.details: On Attacked: If hit by ranged weapon, deals 1+UL Sound damage to attacker.

Heavy.name: Haunted Armor
Heavy.details: UL*2% chance to inflict Fear on attacker. Barghest ally if UL >= 10.

Heavy.name: Turtle Shell
Heavy.details: Getting up from knockdown costs +1 Momentum. Reduces back damage and grants back Critical Evade.

Light.name: Roughspun Tunic
Light.details: Material: Cloth +10 HP Set: Unassuming Adventurer.

Light.name: Armor of Nails
Light.details: Material: Cloth On Attacked: Deals 25% of your level as Pierce damage to attacker.
specialEffects: On Attacked: Pierce damage to attacker

Light.name: Irisgold
Light.details: 30% Light Resistance Increases STR and WIL by 2 when HP is restored.

Light.name: Mayelia
Light.details: 30% Fire Resistance Restores 15% HP if turn is skipped due to status.

Light.name: Whynesfelt
Light.details: Material: Cloth 30% Earth Resistance Prevents caster from using Attack/Dispel spells next turn.

Light.name: Zwellrauss
Light.details: 30% Water Resistance Gives party +2 Power when you are attacked.

Light.name: Argonaut
Light.details: 10% Water Resistance Ignore movement penalties from Flooded Water tiles.

Light.name: Mermanmail
Light.details: +3 Water ATK Bonuses while on water tiles.

Light.name: Adversity Tunic
Light.details: Material: Cloth Reduces damage by 10% per enemy beyond first within 2 Range (max 40%).

Light.name: Blackheart
Light.details: +3 STR, +3 WIL 10% Light Resistance.

Light.name: Detective Trenchcoat
Light.details: Material: Cloth Reduces gun damage by 5. Increases max encumbrance by 5.

Light.name: Fencer's Chestguard
Light.details: If main class is Duelist, stat bonuses increased by 50% (min. 1).

Light.name: Jerkin of Fortune
Light.details: Material: Cloth On Battle Start: Gain +5 Luck. Set: Precautionary Tale.
specialEffects: Luck bonus lost on status infliction

Light.name: Sniper's Chainmail
Light.details: Material: Cloth If main class is Archer, stat bonuses increased by 50% (min. 1).

Light.name: Tamer's Regalia
Light.details: Material: Cloth If main class is Summoner, stat bonuses increased by 50% (min. 1).

Light.name: Thief's Poncho
Light.details: Material: Cloth If main class is Rogue, stat bonuses increased by 50% (min. 1).

Light.name: Alchemic Grain
Light.details: Doubles item material effects that modify this item's parameters.

Light.name: Rough Ranger
Light.details: Material: Cloth +3 Fire ATK Reduce Beast damage by 5%. Ignore thick vine penalties.

Light.name: Worg Pelt
Light.details: Material: Cloth 10% Ice Resistance Triggers Roar skill when taking Dark damage.

Light.name: Green-Scale Tunic
Light.details: Increases Evade vs enemies based on their missing FP. Saps FP on evade.
specialEffects: Evade bonus vs low FP enemies

Light.name: In-Fighter Gi
Light.details: Material: Cloth Increases Evade against enemies within 1 Range by UL.

Light.name: Ooze Armor
Light.details: -3 CEL Puts enemy skills on cooldown when hit. UL% chance for 2 round cooldown.

Light.name: Reactive Armor
Light.details: Explodes when critically hit or taking Fire damage. Creates Firey Armor on Fire trigger.

Unarmored.name: Wisp Cloak
Unarmored.details: +30 FP Made from magical cloth, this cloak holds Focus within it.

Unarmored.name: Flower-Wreathed Tunic
Unarmored.details: Material: Wood +3 Earth ATK Creates flowers and gains evade bonuses.
